word_mean: 扭转：正常或自然形状、位置的扭曲。心理学上指对潜意识或冲动的改头换面，俾能为意识所接受。光学和放射学上指影像与物体或结构的真实轮廓或形状的偏离
横向放大率随视场的增大而变化所引起的一种失去物像相似的像差，但不影响像的清晰度。
又称“畸变”。任何非故意造成的且通常不希望有的信号变化。

sentence.Network_en: A bigger objection is that aggregation of the results invites distortion.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种更大的异议是把各种结果集中考虑容易导致曲解。

sentence.Network_en: Audio signals can be transmitted along cables without distortion.
sentence.Network_cn: 声音信号可以通过电缆传送而不失真。

sentence.Network_en: a grotesque distortion of the truth

石家庄雅信博文翻译有限公司 ... phase difference 相位差 phase distortion 相位失真 phase inversion 倒相.
枕形失真（Pincushion Distortion）又称枕形畸变，它是由镜头引起的画面向中间“收缩”的现象。我们在使用长焦镜头或使用变焦镜头 …
专业音频术语中英文对照 ... Harmonic 谐波 Harmonic distortion 谐波失真 Harmonic Generator 谐波发生器.

entry.def: Distortion is the changing of something into something that is not true or not acceptable.

example.ex: I think it would be a gross distortion of reality to say that they were motivated by self-interest...
example.tran: 我认为说他们是受自身利益的驱使是对事实的严重歪曲。

example.ex: He later accused reporters of wilful distortion and bias.
example.tran: 他后来指责记者有意歪曲事实并带有偏见。

entry.def: Distortion is the changing of the appearance or sound of something in a way that makes it seem strange or unclear.

example.ex: Audio signals can be transmitted along cables without distortion.
example.tran: 声音信号可以通过电缆传送而不失真。

means.word_mean: 3. an optical phenomenon resulting from the failure of a lens or mirror to produce a good image
4. a change (usually undesired) in the waveform of an acoustic or analog electrical signal; the difference between two measurements of a signal (as between the input and output signal);

sentences.sentence: "heavy metal guitar players use vacuum tube amplifiers to produce extreme distortion"

means.word_mean: 5. the act of distorting something so it seems to mean something it was not intended to mean
6. the mistake of misrepresenting the facts

stems_affixes.value_cn: 扭弯, 扭歪, 歪曲
stems_affixes.word_buile: contort[v.[使]扭曲]+ion表名词→n.扭弯, 扭歪, 歪曲
contortion[n.扭弯, 扭歪, 歪曲]+ist人→n.柔术[柔软体操]演员
distort[v.弄歪[嘴脸等];扭曲;歪曲[真理,事实等]]+ion表名词→n.弄歪,歪曲;畸变
retort[n.&v.报复,反击,反驳]+ion表名词→n.报复

stems_affixes.value_cn: 折磨;令人痛苦的东西[人]
stems_affixes.word_buile: tor=tort扭曲+ment表名词,物等→扭的状态→拷问;苦恼
tors=tort扭曲+ion表名词→n.[物][机] 扭转, 转矩

stems_affixes.value_cn: 弄歪[嘴脸等];扭曲;歪曲[真理,事实等]
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不,坏+tort扭曲→扭坏了→曲解,歪曲
tor=tort扭曲+ment表名词,物等→扭的状态→拷问;苦恼

sentences.en: His report was attacked as a gross distortion of the truth.
sentences.cn: 他的报告受到攻击，被指为严重歪曲事实。

sentences.en: Part of the output of an amplifier can be fed back to get rid of sound distortion.
sentences.cn: 放大器的部分输出可以进行反馈以消除声音的失真。

sentences.en: The wrong chemical balance can cause severe distortion of the photographic image.
sentences.cn: 化学药水不合比例可引致摄影图像的严重失真。
